explains: n. 特质；个性；讲究；基督教神学中有关耶稣的教义

sentences.en: He laid special stress on analysing the particularity of the contradiction.
sentences.cn: 他重点分析了这一矛盾的特殊性。

sentences.en: It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
sentences.cn: 矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。

sentences.en: Incipit of pebble has its particularity.
sentences.cn: 卵石的起动有其特殊性。
